short_description: assembly jiu-jitsu is a martial arts gyms company based in bloomfield township, michigan, united states.
long_description: the vision developed from a desire to take the tradition of brazilian jiu jitsu, passed down through the finest training and instruction, and present it in an elevated environment with the highest quality of services and amenities. we envisioned a modern and artistic space that will serve as inspiration to enhance your training and help meet your goals. we believe assembly is the manifestation of that vision. a story devoid of a mission is hollow and unremarkable. assembly is more than a gym and more than a space to learn a new skill. it is a place where you can feel comfortable making mistakes, where you will win and lose, where you will make friends and get to better know yourself. our mission is to build a community of trust, hard-work, and mutual respect. we hope to grow this community of practitioners into one of the most respected brazilian jiu jitsu schools in the nation based on our quality of students, competitors, and instruction.
generated_description: assembly jiu-jitsu is a martial arts training facility located in birmingham, michigan. the company specializes in brazilian jiu-jitsu, offering programs for both children and adults, as well as private training sessions. the facility is designed to provide a modern and artistic environment that enhances the training experience. assembly jiu-jitsu emphasizes high-quality instruction rooted in the traditions of brazilian jiu-jitsu, with instructors tracing their lineage back to master helio gracie. the company aims to build a community of trust, hard work, and mutual respect, aspiring to become one of the most respected brazilian jiu-jitsu schools in the nation.
